comment: офицеры на мостике обсуждают, что Ирлиэт ушла в укромное место

languages.text: "А ты не слышал? Новая питомица Вольного Торговца прогнала часть служителей с нижнего уровня, и теперь ошивается там, в тенях".

traits.locale_text: {Драфт} а ты не слышал? новый питомец РТ прогнала часть служителей с нижнего уровня мостика, и теперь постоянно находиться там

languages.text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."
languages.original_text: "А ты не слышал? Новая питомица Вольного Торговца прогнала часть служителей с нижнего уровня, и теперь ошивается там, в тенях".

traits.locale_text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."
"You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."
"You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."
"You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."
"You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."

languages.text: “你没听说吗？行商浪人的新宠物把一部分仆人赶出了底层甲板。现在她就躲在那里，躲在暗处。”
languages.original_text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."

traits.locale_text: “你没听说吗？行商浪人的新宠物把一部分仆人赶出了底层甲板。现在她就躲在那里，躲在暗处。”

languages.text: 「まだ知らないのか？自由開拓者の新しいペットが従者何人かを下層から追い出したんだ。そこに彼女は隠れてるのさ。影の中にな」
languages.original_text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."

traits.locale_text: 「まだ知らないのか？自由開拓者の新しいペットが従者何人かを下層から追い出したんだ。そこに彼女は隠れてるのさ。影の中にな」

languages.text: « Vous êtes au courant ? Le nouvel animal de compagnie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a forcé des serviteurs à quitter le niveau inférieur. C'est là qu'elle rôde désormais dans l'ombre. »
languages.original_text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes au courant ? Le nouvel animal de compagnie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a forcé des serviteurs à quitter le niveau inférieur. C'est là qu'elle rôde désormais dans l'ombre. »

languages.text: «¿Te has enterado? La nueva mascota de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente obligó a algunos sirvientes a abandonar el nivel inferior. Ahora merodea por ahí, en las sombras».
languages.original_text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."

traits.locale_text: «¿Te has enterado? La nueva mascota de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente obligó a algunos sirvientes a abandonar el nivel inferior. Ahora merodea por ahí, en las sombras».

languages.text: "Habt Ihr nicht gehört? Das neue Haustier {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat einige Diener von der unteren Ebene verjagt. Und jetzt lauert sie dort, in den Schatten."
languages.original_text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr nicht gehört? Das neue Haustier {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat einige Diener von der unteren Ebene verjagt. Und jetzt lauert sie dort, in den Schatten."

languages.text: "Duymadın mı? Hür Tacir'in yeni evcil hayvanı, birkaç hizmetkârı alt seviyelere kovmuş. Artık orada, gölgelerde takılıyor."
languages.original_text: "You haven't heard? The Rogue Trader's new pet forced some of the servants off the lower level. That's where she lurks now, in the shadows."

traits.locale_text: "Duymadın mı? Hür Tacir'in yeni evcil hayvanı alt seviyelerdeki birkaç hizmetkârı kovmuş. Artık orada, gölgelerde takılıyor."
